attribute.name: acceptCount
attribute.description: The accept count for this Connector

attribute.name: address
attribute.description: The IP address on which to bind

attribute.name: algorithm
attribute.description: The certificate encoding algorithm to be used

attribute.name: allowTrace
attribute.description: Allow disabling TRACE method

attribute.name: bufferSize
attribute.description: The input buffer size we should create on input streams

attribute.name: className
attribute.description: Fully qualified class name of the managed object

attribute.name: clientAuth
attribute.description: Should we require client authentication?

attribute.name: ciphers
attribute.description: Comma-separated list of SSL cipher suites to be enabled

attribute.name: compression
attribute.description: Compression value

attribute.name: connectionLinger
attribute.description: Linger value on the incoming connection

attribute.name: connectionTimeout
attribute.description: Timeout value on the incoming connection

attribute.name: connectionUploadTimeout
attribute.description: Timeout value on the incoming connection during request processing

attribute.name: disableUploadTimeout
attribute.description: Should Tomcat ignore setting a timeout for uploads?

attribute.name: emptySessionPath
attribute.description: The 'empty session path' flag for this Connector

attribute.name: enableLookups
attribute.description: The 'enable DNS lookups' flag for this Connector

attribute.name: executorName
attribute.description: The name of the executor - if any - associated with this Connector

attribute.name: keepAliveTimeout
attribute.description: The number of seconds Tomcat will wait for a subsequent request before closing the connection

attribute.name: keystoreFile
attribute.description: Pathname to the key store file to be used

attribute.name: keystorePass
attribute.description: Password for accessing the key store file

attribute.name: keystoreType
attribute.description: Type of keystore file to be used for the server certificate

attribute.name: keyAlias
attribute.description: Alias name of this connector's keypair and supporting certificate chain

attribute.name: localPort
attribute.description: The port number on which this connector is listening to requests. If the special value for port of zero is used then this method will report the actual port bound.

attribute.name: maxHeaderCount
attribute.description: The maximum number of headers that are allowed by the container. 100 by default. A value of less than 0 means no limit.

attribute.name: maxHttpHeaderSize
attribute.description: Maximum size in bytes of the HTTP header

attribute.name: maxKeepAliveRequests
attribute.description: Maximum number of Keep-Alive requests to honor per connection

attribute.name: maxParameterCount
attribute.description: The maximum number of parameters (GET plus POST) which will be automatically parsed by the container. 10000 by default. A value of less than 0 means no limit.

attribute.name: maxPostSize
attribute.description: Maximum size in bytes of a POST which will be handled by the servlet API provided features

attribute.name: maxSpareThreads
attribute.description: The maximum number of unused request processing threads

attribute.name: maxThreads
attribute.description: The maximum number of request processing threads to be created

attribute.name: minSpareThreads
attribute.description: The number of request processing threads that will be created

attribute.name: port
attribute.description: The port number on which this connector is configured to listen for requests. The special value of 0 means select a random free port when the socket is bound.

attribute.name: protocol
attribute.description: Coyote protocol handler in use

attribute.name: protocolHandlerClassName
attribute.description: Coyote Protocol handler class name

attribute.name: proxyName
attribute.description: Ther Server name to which we should pretend requests to this Connector

attribute.name: proxyPort
attribute.description: Ther Server port to which we should pretend requests to this Connector

attribute.name: redirectPort
attribute.description: The redirect port for non-SSL to SSL redirects

attribute.name: scheme
attribute.description: Protocol name for this Connector (http, https)

attribute.name: secret
attribute.description: Authentication secret (I guess ... not in Javadocs)

attribute.name: secure
attribute.description: Is this a secure (SSL) Connector?

attribute.name: sslProtocol
attribute.description: SSL protocol variant to be used

attribute.name: sslProtocols
attribute.description: Comma-separated list of SSL protocol variants to be enabled

attribute.name: strategy
attribute.description: Thread pool strategy

attribute.name: tcpNoDelay
attribute.description: Should we use TCP no delay?

attribute.name: tomcatAuthentication
attribute.description: Should Tomcat perform all authentications?

attribute.name: threadPriority
attribute.description: The thread priority for processors

attribute.name: trustStoreFile
attribute.description: Pathname to the trust store file to be used

attribute.name: trustStorePass
attribute.description: Password for accessing the trust store file

attribute.name: trustStoreType
attribute.description: Type of trust store file to be used for trusted certificates

attribute.name: URIEncoding
attribute.description: Character encoding used to decode the URI

attribute.name: useBodyEncodingForURI
attribute.description: Should the body encoding be used for URI query parameters

attribute.name: xpoweredBy
attribute.description: Is generation of X-Powered-By response header enabled/disabled?
